text: The qualification group 3 for the 2010 European Men's Handball Championship includes the national teams of Belgium, Estonia, Iceland, Macedonia and Norway. == Standings == == Fixtures and results == \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==References== * EHF Euro Events – Men's EURO 2010 (qualification) Qualification, Group 3
title: 2010 European Men's Handball Championship qualification – Group 3
